name: Thalassophobia (itch) (M. A. Dubbs)
description:
Interactive poem created for shufPoetry Experimental Poetry Game Jam Summer 2021. Explores Thalassophobia (phobia of deep water) and depression. 

Controls: Click screen or blue word to move through game. 

Headphones recommended

Epilepsy Warning: This project contains some flashing lights/images.
